```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}

# Creating a dataframe df with the Lineage and DepMap_ID to find the DepMap IDs of the ovary cell lines

lineage <- prism.cl$lineage

DepMap_ID <- prism.cl$DepMap_ID

df <- data.frame(lineage, DepMap_ID)

# These depmap IDs belong to the ovary cell lines:

df_ovary_Depmap <- subset(df, lineage == "ovary")

ovary_DepMap_IDs <- c(df_ovary_Depmap$DepMap_ID)

ovary_DepMap_IDs

# Extracting the ovary cell line rows from prism

prism_ovary <- subset(prism, DepMap_ID %in% ovary_DepMap_IDs)


```
